stsjorbsmod:EyeOfTheStorm.NAME: Eye of the Storm
stsjorbsmod:EyeOfTheStorm.DESCRIPTION: Gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity of current memory, then remember a random memory you do not have stsjorbsmod:Clarity of. NL Gain !B! Block.

stsjorbsmod:BlackTentacles.NAME: Black Tentacles
stsjorbsmod:BlackTentacles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Attacks with random targets target this enemy for !M! turn.
stsjorbsmod:BlackTentacles.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Attacks with random targets target this enemy for !M! turns.

stsjorbsmod:ArcaneWeapon.NAME: Arcane Weapon
stsjorbsmod:ArcaneWeapon.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, attack a random enemy for !D! damage.

stsjorbsmod:Firebolt.NAME: Firebolt
stsjorbsmod:Firebolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage + !M! damage for each stsjorbsmod:Clarity.

stsjorbsmod:MagicMissiles.NAME: Magic Missiles
stsjorbsmod:MagicMissiles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage again once for each stsjorbsmod:Clarity.

stsjorbsmod:TrueStrike.NAME: True Strike
stsjorbsmod:TrueStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This damage cannot be prevented or reduced.

stsjorbsmod:Counterspell.NAME: Counterspell
stsjorbsmod:Counterspell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Artifact if enemy intends to apply a negative effect.

stsjorbsmod:DisguiseSelf.NAME: Disguise Self
stsjorbsmod:DisguiseSelf.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !B! Block next turn.

stsjorbsmod:DoubleCheck.NAME: Double-check
stsjorbsmod:DoubleCheck.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you remember stsjorbsmod:Diligence, gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Diligence.

stsjorbsmod:Channel.NAME: Channel
stsjorbsmod:Channel.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! [E] next turn.

stsjorbsmod:ChainLightning.NAME: Chain Lightning
stsjorbsmod:ChainLightning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Chain to ALL enemies, gaining !M! damage per chain.

stsjorbsmod:WanderingMind.NAME: Wandering Mind
stsjorbsmod:WanderingMind.DESCRIPTION: Gain a random stsjorbsmod:Clarity you do not have yet.

stsjorbsmod:WeightOfMemory.NAME: Weight of Memory
stsjorbsmod:WeightOfMemory.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL cards which "remember".

stsjorbsmod:PrestidigitationA.NAME: Prestidigitation A
stsjorbsmod:PrestidigitationA.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, apply !M! Weak or !M! Vulnerable to a random enemy.

stsjorbsmod:Message.NAME: Message
stsjorbsmod:Message.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from your discard pile into your hand.
stsjorbsmod:Message.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand.

stsjorbsmod:PrestidigitationB.NAME: Prestidigitation B
stsjorbsmod:PrestidigitationB.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, then put !M! cards from your hand on top of your draw pile in random order.

stsjorbsmod:FocusedMind.NAME: Focused Mind
stsjorbsmod:FocusedMind.DESCRIPTION: When remembering stsjorbsmod:Sin, deal !D! damage. NL When remembering stsjorbsmod:Virtue, gain !B! Block.

stsjorbsmod:UnseenServant.NAME: Unseen Servant
stsjorbsmod:UnseenServant.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Sloth. NL Put !M! cards from your discard pile on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
stsjorbsmod:UnseenServant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Sloth. NL Put !M! cards from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

stsjorbsmod:Aid.NAME: Aid
stsjorbsmod:Aid.DESCRIPTION: Heal an enemy for !M! HP. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Kindness.

stsjorbsmod:Mania.NAME: Mania
stsjorbsmod:Mania.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL If you have stsjorbsmod:Sloth, deal !D! damage 2 times again.

stsjorbsmod:Mindworm.NAME: Mindworm
stsjorbsmod:Mindworm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If snapped, deal !M! damage. NL Add a copy of this card to your discard pile.

stsjorbsmod:Hurt.NAME: Hurt
stsjorbsmod:Hurt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose 1 HP per stsjorbsmod:Clarity you have.

stsjorbsmod:OldPocket.NAME: Old Pocket
stsjorbsmod:OldPocket.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gold. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Charity. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:TollTheDead.NAME: Toll the Dead
stsjorbsmod:TollTheDead.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target had already been damaged this turn, deal !D! damage again.

stsjorbsmod:CorpseExplosion_Wanderer.NAME: Corpse Explosion
stsjorbsmod:CorpseExplosion_Wanderer.DESCRIPTION: Starts each combat Exhausted; when an enemy dies, move from Exhaust pile to your hand. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Wrath. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Mending.NAME: Mending
stsjorbsmod:Mending.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! HP for each stsjorbsmod:Clarity. NL End your turn.
stsjorbsmod:Mending.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! HP for each stsjorbsmod:Clarity. NL End your turn. NL Retain.

stsjorbsmod:Rest.NAME: Rest
stsjorbsmod:Rest.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Chastity. NL Gain !B! Block. NL End your turn.

stsjorbsmod:MistyStep.NAME: Misty Step
stsjorbsmod:MistyStep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each stsjorbsmod:Clarity. NL Draw !M! card.
stsjorbsmod:MistyStep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each stsjorbsmod:Clarity. NL Draw !M! cards.

stsjorbsmod:MageArmor.NAME: Mage Armor
stsjorbsmod:MageArmor.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the next damage taken by !M!.

stsjorbsmod:Enervation.NAME: Enervation
stsjorbsmod:Enervation.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Gain Block equal to the target's Poison. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:FindFamiliar.NAME: FindFamiliar
stsjorbsmod:FindFamiliar.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity.
stsjorbsmod:FindFamiliar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, gain stsjorbsmod:Clarity. NL Innate.

stsjorbsmod:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
stsjorbsmod:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Remember stsjorbsmod:Lust.

stsjorbsmod:Withdraw.NAME: Withdraw
stsjorbsmod:Withdraw.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

stsjorbsmod:Study.NAME: Study
stsjorbsmod:Study.DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Patience. NL At the start of each turn, draw !M! card.
stsjorbsmod:Study.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remember stsjorbsmod:Patience. NL At the start of each turn, draw !M! cards.
